content.raw:
First, I love this idea.  Having this as a demo will be very helpful for folks that will want to use the code for competition prep.

Second, I get something similar to what Carlos reports.  When I switch to this branch and run the sand island launch file I get…

    Warning [parser.cc:437] Converting a deprecated SDF source[data-string].
    [FATAL] [1529527576.268913284]: You must call ros::init() before creating the first NodeHandle
    Couldn't find an AF_INET address for []
    Couldn't find an AF_INET address for []
    [ERROR] [1529527576.272691280]: [registerPublisher] Failed to contact master at [:0].  Retrying...

To be sure I switched back to default branch and verified that the launch file runs as expected.

First, I love this idea. Having this as a demo will be very helpful for folks that will want to use the code for competition prep.

Second, I get something similar to what Carlos reports. When I switch to this branch and run the sand island launch file I get…

Warning [parser.cc:437] Converting a deprecated SDF source[data-string].
[FATAL] [1529527576.268913284]: You must call ros::init() before creating the first NodeHandle
Couldn't find an AF_INET address for []
Couldn't find an AF_INET address for []
[ERROR] [1529527576.272691280]: [registerPublisher] Failed to contact master at [:0].  Retrying...

To be sure I switched back to default branch and verified that the launch file runs as expected.
